# 区间分组

[AcWing-906-区间分组](https://www.acwing.com/solution/content/18795/)

## 实现

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int N = 100050;
struct element
{
    int l, r;
    bool operator < (const element &o) const
    {
        return l < o.l;
    }
};
element a[N];
priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int> > pq; // 小根堆

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) scanf("%d%d", &a[i].l, &a[i].r);
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
    {
        element cur = a[i];
        if(pq.empty() || pq.top() >= cur.l)
            pq.push(cur.r);
        else
        {
            pq.pop();
            pq.push(cur.r);
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n", pq.size());
    return 0;
}
```
